issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

issue.title: techcrunch.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://techcrunch.com/2023/09/27/xbox-cloud-gaming-is-coming-to-meta-quest-3-in-december/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftechcrunch.com%2F2023%2F09%2F27%2Fxbox-cloud-gaming-is-coming-to-meta-quest-3-in-december%2F) ### Comment Username: @vonDubenshire > For months, TechCrunch has had issues and I've just put off troubleshooting it until tonight. > > I meticulously went through every single ad filter option and FINALLY even with no DNS either, it still was loading the glitched way. > > It was not until I turned off the final "Ad blocking" even though 0 filters were active, that AdGuard allowed the website to load, and of course it doesn't block anything. > > If there's any issue left I can only think it's some Stealth Mode thing but I don't think I have that on (actually forgot to check) ### Screenshots

> Not reproduced it with our filters or DNS on my end.

Oh well, I'll dig deeper when I'm not tired. 

Thanks

comment.body:
> Can't reproduce. I get "97%".

Are you using the full desktop app or just the Safari extension? Because I get 100% with the first one, but I need the later.

> > I'm on Sonoma, so I guess it may be incompatible with the last version of Safari (17.0). May it be a bug?
> Probably. I have some problems with iOS 17.
> Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.

I tried everything, even uninstalling and reinstalling the extension, restarting the Mac and so on. I'm on a M2 Silicon chip, I don't know if this could be a problem.

issue.title: spotify.link

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://spotify.link/ZKR9kaamrDb](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fspotify.link%2FZKR9kaamrDb) ### Comment > I could not upload my normal Screenshots. It gave me an error, so I uploaded black screens. When I open a link with my filtering protection on specifically, DNS protection, the Spotify link will only open to the main Spotify page. When I disable specifically DNS protections, the Spotify link will correctly open directly to the song. I have also seen this happen with Reddit links. I believe the issue deals with how iPhones handle passing links between applications, and how the DNS filtering intercepts these and maybe clips off some important targeting information for the link. Either way, it means that all of the Spotify links my friend sent me an iMessage and Instagram I cannot open properly. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/hw2pakz3v7s4g0og4kcoks4ggg4kcwo7qjhia8jjdo.png?nc=1)

issue.title: m.jjang0u.com

labels.name: A: By Design
labels.description: The issue cannot be resolved due to technical, ethic, or legal reasons

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

comment.body: I solved it with the user script link you told me. Thank you!

AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard German,
AdGuard Turkish --- @zloyden commented on [Tue May 16 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1549587367) Fixed, update should be available in 2-3 hours. --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1552211820) > Fixed, update should be available in 2-3 hours. @zloyden Just checked it and it's not fixed for me rn. --- @zloyden commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1552519713) Not reproduced it on my end even with a Turkish IP. Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site. If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters). --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1552929974) > Not reproduced it on my end even with a Turkish IP. > > Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site. > > If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters). Tried everything that you've said but it's not working. It's only for me I guess. --- @zloyden commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1552995058) Strange, try to do next: 1. Add the rule `yorum.altin.in#?#.sol > div:has(> ins.adsbygoogle)` in User rules 2. Wait ~ 1 minute there 3. Clear Safari browser data 4. Restart it 5. Open the site --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1553051488) > Strange, try to do next: > > 1. Add the rule `yorum.altin.in#?#.sol > div:has(> ins.adsbygoogle)` in User rules > > 2. Wait ~ 1 minute there > > 3. Clear Safari browser data > > 4. Restart it > > 5. Open the site > > Without nitefall extension
Screenshot: ![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/51786709/b8a5f477-2605-4805-b9b1-d40cc4bd1fe6)

With nitefall ex
Screenshot: ![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/51786709/a9141139-735f-46c8-ab3e-f34c669e28c8)

Just tried without the user rule same response --- @zloyden commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1553138017) > Without nitefall extension Do you mean [this](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nitefall-dark-mode-for-safari/id1575190591)? As I can see, if you enable nitefall extension, you'll get the leftover. So, seems that the problem is not with the rules. --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1553150547) > > Without nitefall extension > > > > Do you mean [this](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nitefall-dark-mode-for-safari/id1575190591)? As I can see, if you enable nitefall extension, you'll get the leftover. > > So, seems that the problem is not with the rules. Yes that's the extension. Yeah that's the cause of the issue. That's the first time this extension caused an issue.

issue.title: m.jjang0u.com

labels.name: A: By Design
labels.description: The issue cannot be resolved due to technical, ethic, or legal reasons

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

AdGuard Turkish --- @zloyden commented on [Tue May 16 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1549587367) Fixed, update should be available in 2-3 hours. --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1552211820) > Fixed, update should be available in 2-3 hours. @zloyden Just checked it and it's not fixed for me rn. --- @zloyden commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1552519713) Not reproduced it on my end even with a Turkish IP. Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site. If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters). --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1552929974) > Not reproduced it on my end even with a Turkish IP. > > Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site. > > If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters). Tried everything that you've said but it's not working. It's only for me I guess. --- @zloyden commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1552995058) Strange, try to do next: 1. Add the rule `yorum.altin.in#?#.sol > div:has(> ins.adsbygoogle)` in User rules 2. Wait ~ 1 minute there 3. Clear Safari browser data 4. Restart it 5. Open the site --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1553051488) > Strange, try to do next: > > 1. Add the rule `yorum.altin.in#?#.sol > div:has(> ins.adsbygoogle)` in User rules > > 2. Wait ~ 1 minute there > > 3. Clear Safari browser data > > 4. Restart it > > 5. Open the site > > Without nitefall extension
Screenshot: ![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/51786709/b8a5f477-2605-4805-b9b1-d40cc4bd1fe6)

With nitefall ex
Screenshot: ![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/51786709/a9141139-735f-46c8-ab3e-f34c669e28c8)

Just tried without the user rule same response --- @zloyden commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1553138017) > Without nitefall extension Do you mean [this](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nitefall-dark-mode-for-safari/id1575190591)? As I can see, if you enable nitefall extension, you'll get the leftover. So, seems that the problem is not with the rules. --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1553150547) > > Without nitefall extension > > > > Do you mean [this](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nitefall-dark-mode-for-safari/id1575190591)? As I can see, if you enable nitefall extension, you'll get the leftover. > > So, seems that the problem is not with the rules. Yes that's the extension. Yeah that's the cause of the issue. That's the first time this extension caused an issue.

Just tried without the user rule same response --- @zloyden commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1553138017) > Without nitefall extension Do you mean [this](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nitefall-dark-mode-for-safari/id1575190591)? As I can see, if you enable nitefall extension, you'll get the leftover. So, seems that the problem is not with the rules. --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1553150547) > > Without nitefall extension > > > > Do you mean [this](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nitefall-dark-mode-for-safari/id1575190591)? As I can see, if you enable nitefall extension, you'll get the leftover. > > So, seems that the problem is not with the rules. Yes that's the extension. Yeah that's the cause of the issue. That's the first time this extension caused an issue.

comment.body:
After spoken with `@Alex-302`, it was decided to leave it as it is.
It is blocked by the AdGuard, there is no ad. The thing is, it is the Nitefall extension that interferes with the code of the website.

AdGuard Turkish --- @zloyden commented on [Tue May 16 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1549587367) Fixed, update should be available in 2-3 hours. --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1552211820) > Fixed, update should be available in 2-3 hours. @zloyden Just checked it and it's not fixed for me rn. --- @zloyden commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1552519713) Not reproduced it on my end even with a Turkish IP. Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site. If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters). --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1552929974) > Not reproduced it on my end even with a Turkish IP. > > Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site. > > If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters). Tried everything that you've said but it's not working. It's only for me I guess. --- @zloyden commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1552995058) Strange, try to do next: 1. Add the rule `yorum.altin.in#?#.sol > div:has(> ins.adsbygoogle)` in User rules 2. Wait ~ 1 minute there 3. Clear Safari browser data 4. Restart it 5. Open the site --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1553051488) > Strange, try to do next: > > 1. Add the rule `yorum.altin.in#?#.sol > div:has(> ins.adsbygoogle)` in User rules > > 2. Wait ~ 1 minute there > > 3. Clear Safari browser data > > 4. Restart it > > 5. Open the site > > Without nitefall extension
Screenshot: ![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/51786709/b8a5f477-2605-4805-b9b1-d40cc4bd1fe6)

With nitefall ex
Screenshot: ![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/51786709/a9141139-735f-46c8-ab3e-f34c669e28c8)

Just tried without the user rule same response --- @zloyden commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1553138017) > Without nitefall extension Do you mean [this](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nitefall-dark-mode-for-safari/id1575190591)? As I can see, if you enable nitefall extension, you'll get the leftover. So, seems that the problem is not with the rules. --- @gototheskinny commented on [Thu May 18 2023](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151001#issuecomment-1553150547) > > Without nitefall extension > > > > Do you mean [this](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nitefall-dark-mode-for-safari/id1575190591)? As I can see, if you enable nitefall extension, you'll get the leftover. > > So, seems that the problem is not with the rules. Yes that's the extension. Yeah that's the cause of the issue. That's the first time this extension caused an issue.

comment.body:
> After spoken with `@Alex-302`, it was decided to leave it as it is.
> 
> It is blocked by the AdGuard, there is no ad. The thing is, it is the Nitefall extension that interferes with the code of the website.

OK, I get it. Thank you guys for checking!
